Reviews.Title: Cheaply Made
Reviews.Author: FLRON "BigRon"
Reviews.Content: I bought two signs, one for the front and one for the rear of my home. The biggest complaint I have is the cheap, plastic, stake used to hold the up the signs. They are way too short. When you push it into the ground, the sign (also plastic) is so low, no one would see it. I had to tape the sign to my rear storm door window so it could be readily seen. That looked tacky. I had to place the front sign in a flower box to be seen. That one keeps getting blown over when it is windy. My old sign (now broken after 20 years, from storm damage) from a previous security company had a strong, metal stake about four feet long. The Swann sign also came with stickers for windows and doors. They were written in English and Spanish. I thought the Spanish language stickers was a bit too much, inferring that Hispanics might try to break in my home. The yard sign itself was also bi-lingual. It is a matter of getting what you pay for. They were cheap in price and unfortunateluy, cheap in value. You may be beter off getting security signs from a box store where you can see them before you buy.

Reviews.Title: Fair to Middling
Reviews.Author: W. Avery "Pastalover2"
Reviews.Content: The sign and sign post, if you can call it that, is a flimsy piece of plastic that is difficult to place in the ground. I was hoping for a much sturdier and realistic looking sign.  That said, they are the only one I found on the web that comes with a post.  For the money I guess it is OK.

Reviews.Title: Good quality
Reviews.Author: GBTB
Reviews.Content: As advertised and fast shipping.  The sign post could be a little heavier material but it is at least sufficient enough to hold the sign up.

Reviews.Title: Early warning to who ever would try something around my home..!
Reviews.Author: Zachary E. Mohrmann
Reviews.Content: Big and blue... And very noticeable to unwanted guests... Just stick it in your lawn with ease of the firm plastic stick that comes with it, and let the sign tell the story...

Reviews.Title: Yard signs
Reviews.Author: David R. Bowden
Reviews.Content: The signs fadded out in less than 5 months you can not even read them. they came apart in a month not good in the wind. Very poor construction!

Reviews.Title: It's a sign .... what do ya expect?
Reviews.Author: Tucan733
Reviews.Content: It's a nice overpriced plastic sign that requires replacing every 2 years due to sun fading.  If ya like it, buy it.

Reviews.Title: Real nice!
Reviews.Author: Toddster1
Reviews.Content: I wished it came with a solid pole.  Plastic one won't last to long.  Sign is good looking though.  Get one.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: NetByte "NetByte"
Reviews.Content: Yes, I would recommend this item. It arrived as advertised, on time, safely packaged, and I had no issues at all.I would def do business with this company again.Excellent product !! -Jim  :-)

Reviews.Title: Security sign
Reviews.Author: BRENT MULLEN
Reviews.Content: I purchased this sign after installing my new security system. The sign itself is real small. The stick that goes in the ground is made of plastic. Personally I would rather have a sign that is much bigger & more durable. I do believe you can get a much bigger & better sign for the same price.

Reviews.Title: half and half on review
Reviews.Author: L. Billingsley
Reviews.Content: It arrived on time, it was packed nice. The only problem was once attempting to put it together the clip on the back would not connect, so I am not able to place it in the ground unless I use tape.

Reviews.Title: Stickers are in Spanish...
Reviews.Author: Shopper
Reviews.Content: Great if you live an area heavily populated with Spanish-speaking burglars, I guess...I'd rather they be in English!

Reviews.Title: Securtiy Sign
Reviews.Author: Island relaxor
Reviews.Content: The sign is outstanding and it is from a real secuity systems manufacture which lends credibility to the sign. Good quality product.

ProductInfo.Features:
Highly visible blue and red finish
Large 6-inch diameter sign with stake
Use in the front yard with stake
Mount sign to window or fence
Includes window stickers as an added security deterrent
ProductInfo.Name: Swann SW276-YSS Security Yard Stake Warning Sign
